divs: Sighting DetailsIt starts as 2 lights in the sky above yucca. one light disapers and re aperes 10-15 miles away. then the process reverses. the lights disapers and reapear over the mountain range to the east and then back to the south east near havasu. when the lights disaper thet slowly fade out. this went on for 1.5-2 hrs.
trends: There has been one other sighting in yucca
There were no other sightings in yucca on or around February 8th 2012
